[{"id":"QCT-1384","entityId":"66-4292","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"QCT"},{"name":"summary","value":"RSSI value does not update histogram if value does not change"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Viktor Selleby"},{"name":"created","value":"1566230035784"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"1384"},{"name":"description","value":"

The Tuning.rssi should have the ALWAYS_PUSH trait

"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Magnus Andersson"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"vse"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"mad"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"updated","value":"1567064609749"},{"name":"resolved","value":"1566230173736"},{"name":"Type","value":["Bug"],"valueId":["Bug"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"State","value":["System Tested"],"valueId":["System Tested"],"color":{"bg":"#0050a1","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Blocked","value":["Unimpeded"],"valueId":["Unimpeded"],"color":{"bg":"#409600","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Release","value":["1.6.0"],"valueId":["1.6.0"],"color":null},{"name":"Fixed in RC","value":["RC3"],"valueId":["RC3"],"color":null},{"name":"Sprint","value":["2019_34-35"],"valueId":["2019_34-35"],"color":null},{"name":"QCT Branch","value":["maintenance-1.6"],"valueId":["maintenance-1.6"],"color":null}],"comment":[],"tag":[]}, {"id":"QCT-1389","entityId":"66-4305","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"QCT"},{"name":"summary","value":"1.6.0 RC2 / Pointing page green arrow hysteresis"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Magnus Andersson"},{"name":"created","value":"1566470974028"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"1389"},{"name":"description","value":"

Change the hysteresis on the grren arrows to avoid the arrows to toggle around
Azi 1°
El 0.3°

"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Magnus Andersson"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"mad"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"mad"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"updated","value":"1567064590724"},{"name":"resolved","value":"1566476590402"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"QCT-1375","type":"Relates","role":"relates to"}]},{"name":"Type","value":["Bug"],"valueId":["Bug"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"State","value":["System Tested"],"valueId":["System Tested"],"color":{"bg":"#0050a1","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Blocked","value":["Unimpeded"],"valueId":["Unimpeded"],"color":{"bg":"#409600","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Release","value":["1.6.0"],"valueId":["1.6.0"],"color":null},{"name":"Fixed in RC","value":["RC3"],"valueId":["RC3"],"color":null},{"name":"Sprint","value":["2019_34-35"],"valueId":["2019_34-35"],"color":null},{"name":"QCT Branch","value":["maintenance-1.6"],"valueId":["maintenance-1.6"],"color":null}],"comment":[],"tag":[]}, {"id":"QCT-1388","entityId":"66-4301","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"QCT"},{"name":"summary","value":"1.6.0 RC2 / Ku LNB selection only works one time"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Magnus Andersson"},{"name":"created","value":"1566367358433"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"1388"},{"name":"description","value":"

The correct LNB LO is only set for one change of set-up file. Meaning you can change to a new KU set-up with a different LO but not change back to the first set-up. This is verified with the LNB supply voltage measurement.

"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Magnus Andersson"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"mad"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"mad"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"updated","value":"1567064579328"},{"name":"resolved","value":"1566392784855"},{"name":"Type","value":["Bug"],"valueId":["Bug"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"State","value":["System Tested"],"valueId":["System Tested"],"color":{"bg":"#0050a1","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Blocked","value":["Unimpeded"],"valueId":["Unimpeded"],"color":{"bg":"#409600","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Release","value":["1.6.0"],"valueId":["1.6.0"],"color":null},{"name":"Fixed in RC","value":["RC3"],"valueId":["RC3"],"color":null},{"name":"Sprint","value":["2019_34-35"],"valueId":["2019_34-35"],"color":null},{"name":"QCT Branch","value":["maintenance-1.6"],"valueId":["maintenance-1.6"],"color":null}],"comment":[],"tag":[]}, {"id":"QCT-1385","entityId":"66-4293","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"QCT"},{"name":"summary","value":"1.6.0_RC2 / Degree symbol in set -up name wrong"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Magnus Andersson"},{"name":"created","value":"1566230220633"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"1385"},{"name":"description","value":"

When a set-up is exported and then imported and the name include a ° symbol its displayed with a question mark symbol on the set-up page.

"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Govan Marounsi"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"mad"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"gma"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"updated","value":"1567063552356"},{"name":"Type","value":["Bug"],"valueId":["Bug"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"State","value":["Ready"],"valueId":["Ready"],"color":{"bg":"#fed74a","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Blocked","value":["Unimpeded"],"valueId":["Unimpeded"],"color":{"bg":"#409600","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Sprint","value":["2019_34-35"],"valueId":["2019_34-35"],"color":null},{"name":"QCT Branch","value":["maintenance-1.6"],"valueId":["maintenance-1.6"],"color":null}],"comment":[],"tag":[]}, {"id":"QCT-1403","entityId":"66-4341","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"QCT"},{"name":"summary","value":"1.6.0 RC3 / auto change to tuning page doesnt work"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Magnus Andersson"},{"name":"created","value":"1567062359392"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"1403"},{"name":"description","value":"

If the beacon has a lock when going into the pointing page the tuning page is not automatically selected even that the Beacon LED is green.
Moving away the antenna to have beacon unlock and lock again will then trigger the page change.

"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Magnus Andersson"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"mad"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"mad"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"updated","value":"1567062359392"},{"name":"Type","value":["Bug"],"valueId":["Bug"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"State","value":["New"],"valueId":["New"],"color":null},{"name":"Blocked","value":["Unimpeded"],"valueId":["Unimpeded"],"color":{"bg":"#409600","fg":"#fff"}}],"comment":[],"tag":[]}, {"id":"QCT-1402","entityId":"66-4339","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"QCT"},{"name":"summary","value":"1.6.0 RC3 / Histogram page with different update speed"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Magnus Andersson"},{"name":"created","value":"1567061757374"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"1402"},{"name":"description","value":"

The histogram on the tuning page looks strange when there is different resolution for the x-axis. The beacon level is updated fast and the RSSI not so often, therefore the beacon level speeds away and leave the RSSI behind.....
Is it possible to synchronize the update freq for the different readings that can be shown in the histogram

"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Magnus Andersson"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"mad"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"mad"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"updated","value":"1567061757374"},{"name":"Type","value":["Bug"],"valueId":["Bug"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"State","value":["New"],"valueId":["New"],"color":null},{"name":"Blocked","value":["Unimpeded"],"valueId":["Unimpeded"],"color":{"bg":"#409600","fg":"#fff"}}],"comment":[],"tag":[]}, {"id":"QCT-1383","entityId":"66-4289","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"QCT"},{"name":"summary","value":"1.6.0_RC1 / 2nd polarization page / No right/left arrows"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Mikael Borin"},{"name":"created","value":"1565967475028"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"1383"},{"name":"description","value":"

2nd polarization page once displayed w/o left/right arrows, see photo...

"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Govan Marounsi"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"mbo"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"1"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"gma"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"updated","value":"1567006412742"},{"name":"resolved","value":"1567006378705"},{"name":"Type","value":["Bug"],"valueId":["Bug"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"State","value":["Fixed"],"valueId":["Fixed"],"color":{"bg":"#409600","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Blocked","value":["Unimpeded"],"valueId":["Unimpeded"],"color":{"bg":"#409600","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Sprint","value":["2019_34-35"],"valueId":["2019_34-35"],"color":null},{"name":"QCT Branch","value":["maintenance-1.6"],"valueId":["maintenance-1.6"],"color":null},{"name":"Assignee","value":[{"value":"gma","fullName":"Govan Marounsi"}]},{"name":"attachments","value":[{"value":"IMG_1141.JPG","id":"85-1358","url":"http://dps-sw-youtrack.corp.datapath.com:8999/_persistent/IMG_1141.JPG?file=85-1358&c=true"}]}],"comment":[{"id":"83-5949","author":"gma","authorFullName":"Govan Marounsi","issueId":"QCT-1383","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
I couldn't reproduce this bug. But it will be great to test this with different setups.
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1567006412744,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]}],"tag":[]}, {"id":"QCT-1401","entityId":"66-4335","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"QCT"},{"name":"summary","value":"Setup with Commercial Ka stopped working"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Bengt-Ove Johansson"},{"name":"created","value":"1567005125513"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"1401"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Bengt-Ove Johansson"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"boj"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"boj"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"updated","value":"1567005129257"},{"name":"Type","value":["Task"],"valueId":["Task"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"State","value":["In Progress"],"valueId":["In Progress"],"color":{"bg":"#fed74a","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Blocked","value":["Unimpeded"],"valueId":["Unimpeded"],"color":{"bg":"#409600","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Sprint","value":["2019_34-35"],"valueId":["2019_34-35"],"color":null},{"name":"Assignee","value":[{"value":"boj","fullName":"Bengt-Ove Johansson"}]}],"comment":[],"tag":[]}, {"id":"DEV-2616","entityId":"66-4196","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"DEV"},{"name":"summary","value":"Changes needed for extending Eutelsat autodeploy characterization"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Govan Marounsi"},{"name":"created","value":"1562228738111"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"2616"},{"name":"description","value":"

Affected Hardware Configuration (IDs for TU, NP, AS, CU, AUX)

Tu = All KU
AS = 200-6

Affected Software Version(s)

2.17

Problem Description

This issue is parent task for all changes needed for keeping characterization

"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Bengt-Ove Johansson"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"gma"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"boj"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"updated","value":"1566999126689"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"DEV-1231","type":"Subtask","role":"parent for"},{"value":"DEV-1944","type":"Subtask","role":"parent for"},{"value":"DEV-1992","type":"Subtask","role":"parent for"},{"value":"DEV-2579","type":"Subtask","role":"parent for"},{"value":"DEV-2599","type":"Subtask","role":"parent for"},{"value":"DEV-2624","type":"Subtask","role":"parent for"}]},{"name":"Type","value":["Task"],"valueId":["Task"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"State","value":["Ready"],"valueId":["Ready"],"color":{"bg":"#fed74a","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Blocked","value":["Unimpeded"],"valueId":["Unimpeded"],"color":{"bg":"#409600","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Edition","value":["Normal Edition"],"valueId":["Normal Edition"],"color":null},{"name":"Branch","value":["maintenance-2.17"],"valueId":["maintenance-2.17"],"color":null},{"name":"Estimated Effort","value":["6360"],"valueId":["2w 3d 2h"],"color":null}],"comment":[],"tag":[{"value":"Backlog","cssClass":"c18"}]}, {"id":"DEV-2624","entityId":"66-4317","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"DEV"},{"name":"summary","value":"Move satellite inclination to satellite database"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Jonas Lindberg"},{"name":"created","value":"1566568988560"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"2624"},{"name":"description","value":"

Affected Hardware Configuration (IDs for TU, NP, AS, CU, AUX)

CCT

Affected Software Version(s)

all

Problem Description

the satellite inclination is specific to the satellite Airbus therfor requests to have the parameter in the satellite database. The parameter should be loaded to the setupfile when selecting satellite

"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Bengt-Ove Johansson"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"jln"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"1"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"boj"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"updated","value":"1566999011280"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"DEV-1231","type":"Relates","role":"relates to"},{"value":"DEV-2616","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"}]},{"name":"Type","value":["Bug"],"valueId":["Bug"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"State","value":["New"],"valueId":["New"],"color":null},{"name":"Blocked","value":["Unimpeded"],"valueId":["Unimpeded"],"color":{"bg":"#409600","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Edition","value":["Normal Edition"],"valueId":["Normal Edition"],"color":null},{"name":"attachments","value":[{"value":"incle.png","id":"85-1363","url":"http://dps-sw-youtrack.corp.datapath.com:8999/_persistent/incle.png?file=85-1363&c=true"}]}],"comment":[{"id":"83-5947","author":"jln","authorFullName":"Jonas Lindberg","issueId":"DEV-2624","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

Satellite database with inclination data is avalible at https://www.ucsusa.org/nuclear-weapons/space-weapons/satellite-database

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1566979954613,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]}],"tag":[]}, {"id":"QCT-1294","entityId":"66-4123","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"QCT"},{"name":"summary","value":"Investigate possibility to make web application "no-cache""},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Viktor Selleby"},{"name":"created","value":"1560432863066"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"1294"},{"name":"description","value":"
It seems the browser caches information in the web server. This can cause problems when switching between different versions. For example creation of setups does not seem to include the "Modem Q-Lite" option when using a browser/computer that recently has created setups for 1.4.2 even though 1.5.0_RC4 is running on the Qct-platform.

Because of this, we need to investigate the possibility to make the web application "no-cache"
"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Govan Marounsi"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"vse"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"1"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"gma"},{"name":"markdown","value":"false"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"updated","value":"1566998733139"},{"name":"resolved","value":"1566998733118"},{"name":"Type","value":["Bug"],"valueId":["Bug"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"State","value":["Fixed"],"valueId":["Fixed"],"color":{"bg":"#409600","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Blocked","value":["Unimpeded"],"valueId":["Unimpeded"],"color":{"bg":"#409600","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Sprint","value":["2019_34-35"],"valueId":["2019_34-35"],"color":null},{"name":"QCT Branch","value":["maintenance-1.5"],"valueId":["maintenance-1.5"],"color":null},{"name":"Assignee","value":[{"value":"sma","fullName":"Sebastian Magnusson"}]}],"comment":[{"id":"83-5921","author":"sma","authorFullName":"Sebastian Magnusson","issueId":"QCT-1294","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

No-cache instructions have now been added to the header but we are having problems running different versions and verifying that this has had the desired effect. @Viktor Selleby, could you take a look at it and see if everything works as intended?

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1563193042834,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]}],"tag":[{"value":"Release Notes","cssClass":"c0"}]}, {"id":"QCT-1398","entityId":"66-4330","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"QCT"},{"name":"summary","value":"Target "bubble" on Pointing Page has disappeared"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Viktor Selleby"},{"name":"created","value":"1566995471851"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"1398"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Viktor Selleby"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"vse"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"vse"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"updated","value":"1566997588484"},{"name":"resolved","value":"1566997588441"},{"name":"Type","value":["Bug"],"valueId":["Bug"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"State","value":["Fixed"],"valueId":["Fixed"],"color":{"bg":"#409600","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Blocked","value":["Unimpeded"],"valueId":["Unimpeded"],"color":{"bg":"#409600","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Sprint","value":["2019_34-35"],"valueId":["2019_34-35"],"color":null},{"name":"QCT Branch","value":["maintenance-1.6"],"valueId":["maintenance-1.6"],"color":null},{"name":"Assignee","value":[{"value":"vse","fullName":"Viktor Selleby"}]}],"comment":[],"tag":[]}, {"id":"QCT-1400","entityId":"66-4333","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"QCT"},{"name":"summary","value":"PropertyClient not working for some objects"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Bengt-Ove Johansson"},{"name":"created","value":"1566997460929"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"1400"},{"name":"description","value":"

"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Bengt-Ove Johansson"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"boj"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"boj"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"updated","value":"1566997473866"},{"name":"Type","value":["Bug"],"valueId":["Bug"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"State","value":["In Progress"],"valueId":["In Progress"],"color":{"bg":"#fed74a","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Blocked","value":["Unimpeded"],"valueId":["Unimpeded"],"color":{"bg":"#409600","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Sprint","value":["2019_34-35"],"valueId":["2019_34-35"],"color":null},{"name":"Assignee","value":[{"value":"boj","fullName":"Bengt-Ove Johansson"}]},{"name":"Estimated Effort","value":["480"],"valueId":["1d"],"color":null}],"comment":[],"tag":[]}, {"id":"QCT-1399","entityId":"66-4331","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"QCT"},{"name":"summary","value":"Improve DomainObject existence control in ViewInstantiator"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Sebastian Magnusson"},{"name":"created","value":"1566995478222"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"1399"},{"name":"description","value":"

"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Sebastian Magnusson"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"sma"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"sma"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"updated","value":"1566995478222"},{"name":"Type","value":["Bug"],"valueId":["Bug"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"State","value":["Ready"],"valueId":["Ready"],"color":{"bg":"#fed74a","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Blocked","value":["Unimpeded"],"valueId":["Unimpeded"],"color":{"bg":"#409600","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Sprint","value":["2019_34-35"],"valueId":["2019_34-35"],"color":null},{"name":"QCT Branch","value":["maintenance-1.6"],"valueId":["maintenance-1.6"],"color":null}],"comment":[],"tag":[]}, {"id":"DEV-2618","entityId":"66-4252","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"DEV"},{"name":"summary","value":"Newtec modem errors visible in the CCT GUI"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Magnus Andersson"},{"name":"created","value":"1565762906483"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"2618"},{"name":"description","value":"

= Affected Hardware Configuration (IDs for TU, NP, AS, CU, AUX) =
NP=22

= Affected Software Version(s) =
2.16.2

= Problem Description =
Customer reported and have requested.
Newtec modem specific error codes should be visible via CCT GUI. Errors are captured in server.log
= Steps to Reproduce the Problem =
Test needs to be done on the Dongen hub to verify this

= Additional Information =

= Expected Result/Finished Criteria =

"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Jonas Lindberg"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"mad"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"1"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"jln"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"updated","value":"1566994711237"},{"name":"Type","value":["Bug"],"valueId":["Bug"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"State","value":["New"],"valueId":["New"],"color":null},{"name":"Blocked","value":["Unimpeded"],"valueId":["Unimpeded"],"color":{"bg":"#409600","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Edition","value":["Normal Edition"],"valueId":["Normal Edition"],"color":null},{"name":"Customer Reference","value":["TT.73"],"valueId":["TT.73"],"color":null}],"comment":[{"id":"83-5948","author":"jln","authorFullName":"Jonas Lindberg","issueId":"DEV-2618","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

And "Modem Status" to transmission tool.
Satellite network lookup, syncronising, syncronised, network login, network layer initialization and operational - HRC.
as well as any error from the modem.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1566994711241,"updated":1566994863251,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]}],"tag":[]}, {"id":"QCT-1397","entityId":"66-4326","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"QCT"},{"name":"summary","value":"1.6.0_RC3 property client is not working any more"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Govan Marounsi"},{"name":"created","value":"1566993487983"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"1397"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Govan Marounsi"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"gma"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"gma"},{"name":"markdown","value":"false"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"updated","value":"1566993487983"},{"name":"Type","value":["Bug"],"valueId":["Bug"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"State","value":["Ready"],"valueId":["Ready"],"color":{"bg":"#fed74a","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Blocked","value":["Unimpeded"],"valueId":["Unimpeded"],"color":{"bg":"#409600","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Sprint","value":["2019_34-35"],"valueId":["2019_34-35"],"color":null},{"name":"QCT Branch","value":["maintenance-1.6"],"valueId":["maintenance-1.6"],"color":null}],"comment":[],"tag":[]}, {"id":"QCT-1328","entityId":"66-4163","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"QCT"},{"name":"summary","value":"Some Contracts should be automatically generated"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Bengt-Ove Johansson"},{"name":"created","value":"1561563850496"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"1328"},{"name":"description","value":"
This could be done where the properties are used dynamically (i.e. lookup by name) instead of directly.

If the property needs to be used directly it should be possible to declare it in the DomainObject like this:

public final ReadWriteProperty<String> someProperty = propertyFromContract(SomeContract.class, "someProperty");
"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Bengt-Ove Johansson"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"boj"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"boj"},{"name":"markdown","value":"false"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"updated","value":"1566991871537"},{"name":"resolved","value":"1566991858845"},{"name":"Type","value":["Task"],"valueId":["Task"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"State","value":["Fixed"],"valueId":["Fixed"],"color":{"bg":"#409600","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Blocked","value":["Unimpeded"],"valueId":["Unimpeded"],"color":{"bg":"#409600","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Sprint","value":["2019_34-35"],"valueId":["2019_34-35"],"color":null}],"comment":[],"tag":[]}, {"id":"QCT-1392","entityId":"66-4313","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"QCT"},{"name":"summary","value":"Create WizardModel that keeps track of what page is currently displayed"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Viktor Selleby"},{"name":"created","value":"1566489790876"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"1392"},{"name":"description","value":"

A lot of logic in the model has to be aware of what page that is displayed. Currently this is done by adding dependencies to ViewModels but as it creates a lot of otherwise unnecessary dependencies a WizardModel is preferable.

"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Govan Marounsi"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"vse"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"gma"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"updated","value":"1566989784107"},{"name":"resolved","value":"1566902992526"},{"name":"Type","value":["Bug"],"valueId":["Bug"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"State","value":["System Test"],"valueId":["System Test"],"color":{"bg":"#0050a1","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Blocked","value":["Unimpeded"],"valueId":["Unimpeded"],"color":{"bg":"#409600","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Release","value":["1.6.0"],"valueId":["1.6.0"],"color":null},{"name":"Fixed in RC","value":["RC3"],"valueId":["RC3"],"color":null},{"name":"Sprint","value":["2019_34-35"],"valueId":["2019_34-35"],"color":null},{"name":"QCT Branch","value":["maintenance-1.6"],"valueId":["maintenance-1.6"],"color":null}],"comment":[],"tag":[]}, {"id":"QCT-1390","entityId":"66-4307","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"QCT"},{"name":"summary","value":"1.6.0 RC2 / iDirect 950MP / RX lock led update"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Magnus Andersson"},{"name":"created","value":"1566471128300"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"1390"},{"name":"description","value":"

The RX lock on the pointing and histogram page is not updated frequently, its about 60s delay for a change.

"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Govan Marounsi"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"mad"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"gma"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"updated","value":"1566989784106"},{"name":"resolved","value":"1566471267628"},{"name":"Type","value":["Bug"],"valueId":["Bug"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"State","value":["System Test"],"valueId":["System Test"],"color":{"bg":"#0050a1","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Blocked","value":["Unimpeded"],"valueId":["Unimpeded"],"color":{"bg":"#409600","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Release","value":["1.6.0"],"valueId":["1.6.0"],"color":null},{"name":"Fixed in RC","value":["RC3"],"valueId":["RC3"],"color":null},{"name":"Sprint","value":["2019_34-35"],"valueId":["2019_34-35"],"color":null},{"name":"QCT Branch","value":["maintenance-1.6"],"valueId":["maintenance-1.6"],"color":null}],"comment":[],"tag":[]}, {"id":"QCT-1369","entityId":"66-4259","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"QCT"},{"name":"summary","value":"Speed up GNSS acquisition time"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Magnus Andersson"},{"name":"created","value":"1565865492549"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"1369"},{"name":"description","value":"

Issue from the D1401-058 doc.
Speed up the initial acquisition, when changing continents or when the unit is new, with the GNSS receiver, by setting the JPOS command with latitude/longitude data from the GPS module.

Command
Format
Specify the latitude and longitude
$JPOS,lat,lon<CR><LF>

where both 'lat' and 'lon':

  • Must be entered in decimal degrees

  • Do not need to be more accurate than half a degree

Query the current setting
$JPOS<CR><LF>

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1566305217041,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]}],"tag":[{"value":"Has ToDo in CodeBase","cssClass":"c4"}]}, {"id":"QCT-1062","entityId":"66-3296","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"QCT"},{"name":"summary","value":"Add compass calibration sounds"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Mikael Borin"},{"name":"created","value":"1521443182038"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"1062"},{"name":"description","value":"
Add compass calibration sounds for successful and unsuccessful calibration of the magnetic compass.

E.g. three tones after each other during 3 x 200 ms with the following frequencies:
Successful calibration: 880, 1175 and 1760 Hz
Unsuccessful calibration: 880, 659 and 440 Hz

Implement
Protocol.
Simulated port.
Domain Object.
Initialisation of GPS.

From document D1401-058 by MBO!

The system time shall be taken from the GPS module, not the GNSS module.

The GPS NMEA data is received on Sitara AM335X serial port COM 5.
(GMII1_COL/RMII2_REFCLK/SPI1_SCLK/UART5_R)

Affected Hardware Configuration (IDs for TU, NP, AS, CU, AUX)

all

Affected Software Version(s)

2.16.1, 2.16.2

Problem Description

It seems that we are not copying log4cpp.properties to the unit with clean_install. The result is that there will not be a driverd.log file.

Steps to Reproduce the Problem

Could the missing driverd.log file cause the system to start up corrcetly? We have had a system during the FAT dont didnt start up correct two different times.
I have re installed 2.16.2 again to recover the driverd.log file
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1561026602795,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]}],"tag":[{"value":"Backlog","cssClass":"c18"}]}, {"id":"QCT-1394","entityId":"66-4319","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"QCT"},{"name":"summary","value":"Make WizardModel.currentPage persistent"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Viktor Selleby"},{"name":"created","value":"1566809372815"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"1394"},{"name":"description","value":"

As WizardModel.currentPage controls the initial page displayed when starting the system, making it persistent will result in the system booting on the last displayed page.
